herd.translation[0].definitions[0].defin: a group of animals of one kind that live and feed together
herd.translation[1].definitions[0].defin: to bring people together in a large group, especially roughly
herd.translation[1].definitions[0].examp: I don’t want to be herded around with a lot of tourists.
The visitors were herded into two large halls.
herd.translation[1].definitions[1].defin: to make animals move together in a group
herd.translation[1].definitions[1].examp: It was Tom’s duty to herd the cows.
